data.actual_result: There is an X under the role.(edited)
data.expected_result: The X should be next to the said role.
data.short_description: !submit When viewing a possible long role name on the Member's list, the X mark is under the name
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Make a role, call it Administrator as it's long Step 2 - Give it to someone and view the Member's list. Give it to multiple people.
